additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Built-in furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: electricity 
 4 room flat with total space of 120 sq.m. in central location – Vake, Kekelidze street, 5 min walk to Chavchavadze avenue. Café-bars, shops, bank, pharmacy, dental clinic, beauty salon, bakery and other necessary facilities - all are situated in the immediate vicinity. Flat is located on the 7th floor, has three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a separate kitchen, hall, living room and a balcony. Flat has all major amenities: • Individual heating system, hot water • Air-conditioner • Internet (wifi) and TV cable (Silknet) • Sofa, table and chairs • Two full bedroom sets • TV-set • Washing machine • Oven and microwave oven • Fridge • Basic cutlery, glasses, cooking utensils • A private garage in the yard will also be provided.
